title: Follow These Quick Tips to Get Rengoku in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Get the Hidden Key.
steps.content: Get the Hidden Key. You can do this in two ways [1] X Research source : Defeat the Awakened Ice Admiral in the Ice Castle within Second Sea [2] X Research source , Kill Arctic Warriors and Snow Lurkers, both of which are in the Ice Castle in Second Sea [3] X Research source . Arctic Warriors and Snow Lurkers have a lower chance of dropping the Hidden Key but are at lower levels than the Awakened Ice Admiral. Increase your chances of getting the key quickly by purchasing a 2x Boss Drops gamepass.

steps.title: Open the chest.
steps.content: Open the chest. Go down the stairs in the Awakened Ice Admiral's spawn room and head to the right of the red carpet. You can walk through a wall in line with the stairs and find the chest containing Rengoku. You get two moves with Rengoku equipped: Demon Slayer and Burning Slash, both of which break Instinct (or Observation Haki) . They are single-target attacks, so you can't damage multiple enemies simultaneously. You can upgrade Rengoku at the Blacksmith in First or Second Sea with 8 Vampire Fangs, 20 Magma Ore, and 15 Scrap Metal.
